overview: Playboy Larry Blendon introduces his grandmother Stella Blendon to his fianc√©e, radio singer Virginia Berneaux. Despite Larry's record of broken romances and divorces, Virginia decides she will marry him. Virginia is slain that night and Blandon telephones his friend, Philo Vance, to help find the killer.
tagline: "EVERY TIME I TRY TO GET NEXT TO A BLONDE...A KILLER GETS THERE FIRST!"
title: Philo Vance Returns
